fields.name: 200px thumbnail
fields.description: Users with this perk have access to thumbnails of their images with a height of 200 pixels.

fields.name: 400px thumbnail
fields.description: Users with this perk have access to thumbnails of their images with a height of 400 pixels.

fields.name: original image
fields.description: Users with this perk have access to their photos in original size.

fields.name: expiring link
fields.description: Users with this perk have ability to fetch expiring link to owned image. Link can be viewed by anyone. User have to specify time in seconds between 300 and 30000
